title: IceRiver - Europe
author: IceRiver - Europe
content: So, as noted in the subject, we've launched IceRiver's OFFICIAL European Branch.We offer:- Delivery all-around the Europe- Customer-Focused support services- Highest quality IceRiver machines- Most importantly - Technical service and Guarantees!You can find us at: www.iceriver.euOr at our new socials: @icerivereu on Twitter, TikTok, Instagram and Facebook.SEE YOU AROUND!

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: Ms_Mining on November 29, 2023, 01:10:37 PMFake.Original site it's Iceriver.ioI think you may be correct. So to all be very careful.

comments.author: lowbander801
comments.body: cant be the original iceriver to sell 429 usd the KS0 and the same rig in EU to cost double up!!!

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: lowbander801 on January 06, 2024, 10:36:36 AMcant be the original iceriver to sell 429 usd the KS0 and the same rig in EU to cost double up!!!He's obviously a scammer, check out his trust feedbackQuote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=3593170 Lucius    2023-12-10    Reference    Promotion of a fake site. Do not buy from unverified sellers and always use escrow (preferably someone reliable from the forum).Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=3593170 logfiles    2023-12-06    Reference    Scammer promoting fake mining gear websiteQuote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=3593170 SFR10    2023-11-30    Reference    Promotes a fake/scam store!!!
